name: Create and Use a Custom ROS Service (.srv)
description: Define a custom AddThreeInts.srv, generate interfaces, build with catkin, and implement Python service & client. ROS1 skeleton is provided; user/AI completes ROS2 implementation.
expected_outcome: Custom service file (.srv) is correctly defined; catkin_make generates service headers; ROS1 service server starts correctly; client calls service successfully returning sum = a + b + c; ROS2 implementation works equivalently.
